bannerTitle: The largest community in Northern Brazil.
bannerDescriptionOne: Technology community for the development area, focused on promoting knowledge sharing, collaboration and networking among its members.
bannerDescriptionTwo: We bring together professionals, students in the area of ​​information technology and other related professionals, holding events, lectures, workshops and other activities to promote people's continuing education and professional development. Furthermore, the community is also a space for exchanging ideas and experiences, as well as strengthening the technological community in the North of Brazil.
eventsButton: Stay up to date with events
supportDescription: These are the companies that support our community
newsletterDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay up to date with the latest news and events.
